Returns: The status value for this content, or -1 is a valid status has not been specified (see the CONTENT_STATUS_* for the defined valid status values).
getStatus().Description: Returns status value for the content associated with the notification. This status indicates whether the referred content is ready to be consumed on the device, or if the user must first purchase, rent, subscribe to, or download the content.

Returns: returns a predefined tag indicating the maturity level rating for the content (see the CONTENT_MATURITY_* constants).
getMaturityRating().Description: Returns the maturity level rating for the content associated with the notification.

Returns: A string containing a representation of the content price in the current locale and currency.
getPricingValue().Description: Gets the price value (when applicable) for the content associated with a notification. The value will be provided as a String containing the price in the appropriate currency for the current locale.

Returns: A predefined tag indicating the pricing type for the content (see the CONTENT_PRICING_* constants).
getPricingType().Description: Gets the pricing type for the content associated with the notification.

Parameters: String: Array of genre string tags that describe the content referred to by a notification.
setGenres(java.lang.String[]).Description: Sets the content genres associated with the notification content. These genres may be used for content ranking. Genres are open ended String tags. Some examples: "comedy", "action", "dance", "electronica", "racing", etc.

Returns: An array of genre tags that describe the content associated with the notification.
getGenres().Description: Returns an array containing the content genres that describe the content associated with the notification.

Returns: The running time, in seconds, of the content associated with the notification.
getRunningTime().Description: Returns the running time for the content associated with the notification.

Parameters: String: A tag indicating the maturity level rating for the content. This tag must be one of the predefined maturity rating tags (see the CONTENT_MATURITY_* constants).
setMaturityRating(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the maturity level rating for the content associated with the notification.

Returns: An array of predefined type tags (see the CONTENT_TYPE_* constants) that describe the content associated with the notification.
getContentTypes().Description: Returns an array containing the content types that describe the content associated with the notification. The first tag entry is considered the primary type for the content, and is used for content ranking purposes.

Parameters: String: Array of predefined type tags (see the CONTENT_TYPE_* constants) that describe the content referred to by a notification.
setContentTypes(java.lang.String[]).Description: Sets the content types associated with the notification content. The first tag entry will be considered the primary type for the content and will be used for ranking purposes. Other secondary type tags may be provided, if applicable, and may be used for filtering purposes.

Returns: A predefined type tag (see the CONTENT_TYPE_* constants) indicating the primary type for the content associated with the notification.
getPrimaryContentType().Description: Returns the primary content type tag for the content associated with the notification.

Parameters: Notification.Builder: the builder to be modified.
extend(android.app.Notification.Builder).Description: Apply content extensions to a notification that is being built. This is typically called by the @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#extend_E@ method of @B_android#app#Notification#Action#Builder_E@.

Parameters: Notification: The notification from which to copy options.
RecommendationExtender(android.app.Notif.Description: Create a @B_android#support#app#recommendation#RecommendationExtender_E@ from the RecommendationExtender options of an existing Notification.

Parameters: int: The status value for this content. Must be one of the predefined content status values (see the CONTENT_STATUS_* constants).
setStatus(int).Description: Sets the availability status for the content associated with the notification. This status indicates whether the referred content is ready to be consumed on the device, or if the user must first purchase, rent, subscribe to, or download the content.

Parameters: long: The runing time, in seconds, of the content associated with the notification.
setRunningTime(long).Description: Sets the running time (when applicable) for the content associated with the notification.

ClassDesc: Helper class to add content info extensions to notifications. To create a notification with content info extensions: Content info extensions can be accessed on an existing notification by using the RecommendationExtender(Notification) constructor, and then using the get methods to access values.
